pageContent: Background: Cancer patients experience many physical, psychosocial, and existential problems and worries during their illness. To support patients in managing their illness, we implemented an online patient-nurse communication (OPNC) service, where breast and prostate cancer patients could ask questions and receive advice from oncology nurses.

metaData.source:
What Are the Experiences of Men Affected by Prostate Cancer Participating in an Ecological Momentary Assessment Study?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30888981/
